Package ohos.agp.render

Class PixelMapDrawInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.PixelMapDrawInfo

  • public class PixelMapDrawInfo
extends Object
    Constant values used as parameters to Canvas#drawDeformedPixelMap(PixelMapHolder, PixelMapDrawInfo, Paint) calls. These values specify PixelMap's draw width, height, draw points, etc.
    Since:
    3

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PixelMapDrawInfo​(int[] divideInfo, float[] verticesParam, int vOffset, int[] colorsParam, int cOffset)
      Parameterized constructor used to create an PixelMapDrawInfo instance.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PixelMapDrawInfo

        public PixelMapDrawInfo​(int[] divideInfo,
                        float[] verticesParam,
                        int vOffset,
                        int[] colorsParam,
                        int cOffset)
        Parameterized constructor used to create an PixelMapDrawInfo instance.
        Parameters:
        divideInfo - Indicates the draw size, the first number is width, the second is height. Notice that the array length must be equal to 2.
        verticesParam - Indicates where the pixelmap should be drawn. Array members ara in pair (x, y), so the array length must be equal or greater than （divideInfo[0] + 1） * (divideInfo[1] + 1) *2 + vOffset.
        vOffset - Indicates the number of vertex elements to skip.
        colorsParam - Indicates the pixelmap's colors at each point. It can be null. if not null, the length must be equal or greater than （divideInfo[0] + 1） * (divideInfo[1] + 1) + cOffset.
        cOffset - Indicates number of colors elements to skip.
        Since:
        3
